## MiddlewareView class

Watch middleware binding keys for the given context and sort them by group

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class MiddlewareView extends ContextView 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [ContextView](./context.contextview.md)

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [middlewareBindingKeys](./express.middlewareview.middlewarebindingkeys.md) | <code>readonly</code> | string\[\] | A list of binding keys sorted by group for registered middleware |
